title: Dungeonborne Class Tier List
description: This tier list provides a comprehensive ranking of all classes in Dungeonborne, from the powerful S-tier options to the more niche C-tier choices. Use this guide to determine which class best suits your playstyle and helps you conquer the dungeons.
heading: Dungeonborne Class Tier List
introText: This tier list provides a comprehensive ranking of all classes in Dungeonborne, from the powerful S-tier options to the more niche C-tier choices. Use this guide to determine which class best suits your playstyle and helps you conquer the dungeons.

data.itemDescription: A damage-dealing powerhouse with high survivability
Offers versatile spellcasting abilities and strong area-of-effect damage
A nimble and stealthy class with excellent critical hit potential
A balanced class with strong defensive and offensive capabilities
A ranged class with various traps and abilities to control the battlefield
A support class focused on healing and buffing allies
A versatile class with a mix of offensive and support abilities
A class that relies on summoning demons to aid in combat
